Summary: three orbs flying south to north, then turning north/west and fading out.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tustin
There were no other sightings in Tustin on or around April 14th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was walking from my car up my walk to my front door when i noticed 3 bright orange\red lights flying south to north(which is against the normal flow of air traffic). the lights were in a straight line and seemed to turn towards the west a bit over the ocean and as they were turning the first one faded and disappeared, then after a few more seconds the last one faded and then the last continued on n\w until it faded from view as well. i called my mom out as it was happening, but she caught the end of it and wasn't very impressed.
